Agent's cost for services provided by ONLINE-CSR™, Inc.

When your clients utilize ONLINE-CSR™ service you have several services you can earn a commission on:
Set up Fees, Premium, Reviewed and Basic Service, Labor and Extra CSR Updates

PRICE SHEET   View this generic Price Quote  Price Quote (Word document)

ONLINE-CSR™ has set an agent buy rate for services.  Each agent can bill the customer directly, have ONLINE-CSR™ bill the customer or waive all the customer's fees if they order services from the agent, in this case the agent will pay for the service out of the proceeds from the sales commission.

Here are the descriptions of each service:

SET UP FEES This is the one-time charge to set up the customer.  This fee is set at $200.00 for all customers and can not be waived, raised or lowered.  The agents cost is $100.00.  

ONLINE-CSR™ gives the client a picture of what they are being billed for by the RBOC and a tool to track orders, adds, moves, changes and inquiries. The price is determined by the number of CSR's each customer has. Click here to view the Pricing Sheet.

 PREMIUM SERVICE 

This is an annual service, the CSR's are entered each month and reviewed for accuracy, we correct any billing problems and make recommendations of potential upgrades to newer technologies. Each month an ONLINE-CSR™ expert in Telecommunications billing and technology will review the records with the Agent and Customer. This service includes all labor associated with correcting all billing errors. It does not include recovery of any overbilling.

 REVIEWED SERVICE 

This is an annual service, the CSR's are entered each month and reviewed for accuracy, we correct any billing problems and make recommendations of potential upgrades to newer technologies. Each month an ONLINE-CSR™ expert in Telecommunications billing and technology will review the records with the Agent and Customer.  All non-revenue generating orders are billed at an hourly rate.

 BASIC SERVICE   

The basic service pulls CSR's twice a year. We enter the records into the database and charge an hourly rate to enter the division, department, description of service. For billing review and technology upgrades we also charge an hourly rate. After a change has been made on a CSR it is highly recommended that another CSR be pulled to replace the outdated record. This would not be necessary if your client has a Premium or Reviewed Service.  You can have a single CSR updated for $10 per CSR.     

 LABOR  

Labor is optional except for the Premium Service. Many times a client will have an account manager that is efficient and the need for ONLINE-CSR™ to follow through on an order is not required. We use only senior Account Consultants (AC) each with over 20 years RBOC experience.  If your client needs some changes made on their account, and they are not revenue generating changes, who can they rely on to do the work.  Disconnects are a prime example, when you place an order for a disconnect it is necessary to follow up and make sure the service actually gets disconnected. Labor is charged in hour increments.
